attributes.action: approve BBC Radio 2 presenter Ken Bruce for a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BBC Radio 2 presenter (9:30am-12pm weekdays) Ken Bruce has long been a familiar and popular figure amongst the British public. His sense of humour and great personality have long provided a valuable service of cheeriness amongst radio listeners - be it at home, work, hospital or abroad. A Knighthood from her majesty the Queen would be fitting recognition for all of Ken's achievements.
